name: Krono (Canceled)
blurb: Control an army of warriors from across time in this unique take on the digital Collectible Card Game genre.

rewards.reward: No Reward
SCOUT LEVEL 1 - In addition to our eternal thanks, you'll be listed as a backer on our Facebook page and also receive a high resolution Krono cover for Facebook.
SCOUT LEVEL 2 - All of the above, plus access to our backer forum where you can discuss the game with other backers and the developers. You'll also be listed as a "Scout" in the game credits.
EARLY BIRD BERSERKER BUNDLE! The first 100 backers will get SCOUT LEVEL 3 for $20.
SCOUT LEVEL 3 - All of the above, plus a Kickstarter exclusive Scout-level digital game card and one sealed digital booster pack.
KRONO STARTER SET - Get SCOUT LEVEL 3, plus 1 booster pack, 1 starter deck of your choice and 3 additional Kickstarter-exclusive cards.

FIGHTER LEVEL 1 - In addition to everything listed above, you'll be granted access to our development builds so you can play the game while we work on it. You'll also get access to our private Developer forums where you can interact with the developers, and you'll be listed as a "Fighter" in the game credits.
FIGHTER LEVEL 2 - All of the above, plus 4 digital sealed Booster packs on game launch.

EARLY BIRD HOLIDAY SPECIAL! Give the gift of Krono this holiday season. Back this level and receive FIGHTER LEVEL 2 for you and SCOUT LEVEL 3 for a friend. We'll send them a Krono holiday e-card that lists everything they'll be getting. We guarantee delivery of this e-card on December 25th. (WE REQUIRE YOU TO SUPPLY A DESTINATION EMAIL ADDRESS BY 12/22/12 TO FULFILL THIS REWARD. YOU CANNOT GET THIS REWARD TIER THROUGH ANY OTHER TIERS.)
FIGHTER LEVEL 3 - All of the above, plus $35 of in-game currency and a Kickstarter exclusive Fighter-level digital game card.

WARRIOR LEVEL 1 - In addition to the contents from all previous tiers, you'll also receive an invitation to a weekly online design chat, which will occur through development until alpha. You'll also receive a Kickstarter exclusive digital "Art of Krono" book and be listed as a "Warrior" in the game credits.
WARRIOR LEVEL 2 - All of the above, but with 10 digital sealed booster packs on game launch.
EARLY BIRD PALADIN BUNDLE! The first 10 backers will get WARRIOR LEVEL 3 for $200.
WARRIOR LEVEL 3 - All of the above, but with $100 of in-game currency and a Kickstarter exclusive Warrior-level digital game card.

BLACK KNIGHT LEVEL 1 - In addition to the content from all previous tiers, you'll receive the first of our 3 Kickstarter exclusive Black Knight-level digital game cards. You'll also be listed as a "Black Knight" in the game credits and receive ten of our physical Krono prototype cards, signed by the dev team.
BLACK KNIGHT LEVEL 2 - All of the above, plus the second of our 3 Kickstarter exclusive Black Knight-level digital game cards - combine them together to multiply their powers.
EARLY BIRD CHAOS BUNDLE! The first 3 backers will get BLACK KNIGHT LEVEL 3 for $667.
BLACK KNIGHT LEVEL 3 - All of the above, plus the third, and most powerful, of our 3 Kickstarter-exclusive Black Knight-level digital game cards - combine them together to multiply their powers.

LEGEND LEVEL 1 - In addition to the content from all previous tiers, we will incorporate your likeness into a common game card and give you a digital copy of the card you are included in. You'll also receive an engraved stainless-steel tankard, an engraved Knight miniature and be listed as a "Legend" in the game credits.

LEGEND LEVEL 2 - All of the above, and you'll also be able to collaborate on your own legendary digital card, starring you! We'll work with you to create the power and abilities and create artwork using your likeness. (You must book and fund your own travel and accommodation.)

LEGEND LEVEL 3 - The ultimate tier. In addition to everything listed above, you'll also receive an invitation to come to the Large Animal offices in NYC and design the next release of Krono cards with the development team. While here, you'll also be able to put different members of our development team in (cardboard) medieval stocks and hurl ripe tomatoes at them. (You must book and fund your own travel and accommodation.)
